title: Is there proper doubt clearing classes in kota? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes there are a lot of classes for doubt clearing like you have Allen, Resonance, Aakash, Motion and many local classes as well for the doubt but in that, you have to join for coaching or tuition then you will be able to solve your doubts So I prefer to go with online classes because you can solve your doubts without joining in those applications just you have to upload your questions and then after you will get your answer There are many online options like Unacademy, Toppr: the better learning app as well for the doubts if any one of them then I will go with Ask Toppr I have been using Toppr Doubts service for the last 10/12 months now and it almost answers every question. So you can register yourself in this application and solve your every doubt So just go and check out all benefits of using ask TOPPR definitely it will help you to solve your doubts Hope my answer help you Keep learning Thank you 👍

There's this coaching called Motion IIT JEE, a pretty small one compared to the other giants you already know like Bansal, Reso, Vibrant, Allen, Career Point etc. They have these assistant teachers who also attend the lectures with students and can provide some help with doubts later when the core teachers are unavailable (which is almost always).  But to be honest anyone is hardly interested. They all eye the students who could produce top AIRs. More than often they will not have time to entertain you. The only people you gotta rely for your doubts are your friends. So having a good company really helps!!
